title: Duke Blue Devils outlast Texas Tech as Mike Krzyzewski returns to Elite Eight - ESPN
content:
1. Duke Blue Devils outlast Texas Tech as Mike Krzyzewski returns to Elite Eight  ESPN
  2. RECAP: Tech falls to Duke in Sweet 16 - Texas Tech Red Raiders  TexasTech.com
  3. Duke vs. Texas Tech score, takeaways: Blue Devils advance to Elite Eight to extend Coach K's career  CBS Sports
  4. No. 2 Duke Fends Off No. 3 Texas Tech, 78-73, to Reach Elite Eight - Duke University  GoDuke.com
  5. Duke, Coach K earn Elite Eight berth with victory over Texas Tech  USA TODAY
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Duke got all it could handle against Texas Tech in a game that featured 11 ties and 13 lead changes, but the Blue Devils won 78-73 to send Mike Krzyzewski back to the Elite Eight.
